main event: Observers reported seeing a bright red object with approximately 10 lights moving to the north on 7 July 1965, and multiple objects were reported on 20 September 1965.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a bright red object that paused for about 10 seconds before continuing out of sight., There were multiple witnesses on 20 September 1965, who reported seeing a bright light similar to satellites., A civilian witness initially contacted Major Quintanilla, believing it to be a UFO., Major Quintanilla explained the sightings were likely artificial satellites, providing visibility times for them., Discussion included analysis of the maneuvers of the objects, which are consistent with other reports.
sighted object: a bright red object with lights, multiple unidentified lights
